title: PETPrep: a robust preprocessing pipeline for PET Data
description: PETPrep is a robust and easy-to-use pipeline for preprocessing of diverse PET data. The transparent workflow dispenses of manual intervention, thereby ensuring the reproducibility of the results.

creators.affiliation: Department of Computer Science, University of Copenhagen
